snippet: Yu Darvish came within one out of a no-hitter for the second time, giving up only a ninth-inning single to David Ortiz in the Texas Rangers’ 8-0 victory over the Boston Red Sox on Friday night.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Texas Rangers beat Boston Red Sox, 8-0; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish came within one out of a no-hitter for the second time, giving up only a ninth-inning single to David Ortiz in the Texas Rangers’ 8-0 victory over the Boston Red Sox on Friday night.

headline.main: Ortiz’s Single in the Ninth Ends Darvish’s Latest Bid for a No-Hitter
headline.print_headline: Ortiz’s Single in the Ninth Ends Darvish’s Latest Bid for a No-Hitter
